Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS11RESTElement.name: RESTElement
Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS11RESTElement.abstract: defines an element that can be handled over a REST property wrapper

Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS10Filterablea.name: Filterable
Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS10Filterablea.abstract: defines an element that can be filtered through a REST property wrapper

Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS8Sortablea.name: Sortable
Typealiases.html#/s:6ELBRUS8Sortablea.abstract: defines an element that can be sorted through a REST property wrapper

Structs/Credentials.html#/s:6ELBRUS11Cre.name: init(userName:password:)
Structs/Credentials.html#/s:6ELBRUS11Cre.abstract: The init for the initialisation of a Credential consisting of an user name and a password.

Structs/Credentials.html.name: Credentials
Structs/Credentials.html.abstract: The Credentials offer the possibility to declare an user name and password for a basic authentication.

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.name: authorization
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.abstract: the variable that holds the authorization method

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.name: get(on:)
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.abstract: implements a GET request for a RESTful interface

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.name: post(_:on:)
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.abstract: implements a POST request for a RESTful interface

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.name: put(_:on:)
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.abstract: implements a PUT request for a RESTful interface

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.name: delete(at:)
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html#/s:6ELBRUS.abstract: implements a DELETE request for a RESTful interface

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: Element
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: specifies the data structure that will be stored

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: wrappedValue
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: defines the data that will be stored

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: storagePath
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: defines a String that characterizes the wrappedValue unique attributes

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: localStorageURL
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: The URL of the parent folder to store the LocalFileStorable in

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: loadFromFile()
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: Load an array of LocalFileStorables from a file

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.name: saveToFile(_:)
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html#/s:6ELB.abstract: Save a collection of LocalFileStorables to a file

Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html.name: LocalFileStorable
Protocols/LocalFileStorable.html.abstract: An object that can be represented and stored as a local file

Protocols/NetworkHandler.html.name: NetworkHandler
Protocols/NetworkHandler.html.abstract: Defines a protocol to represent all the network functionality that is used to communicate with a REST endpoint, the encoding/decoding strategy, the different network requests (get, post, put, delete) and the authorization method.

Functions.html#/s:6ELBRUS27defaultFilter.name: defaultFilterServerStrategy(_:_:_:)
Functions.html#/s:6ELBRUS27defaultFilter.abstract: This is the default filter server strategy oriented a the LHS Brackets from https://www.moesif.com/blog/technical/api-design/REST-API-Design-Filtering-Sorting-and-Pagination/#lhs-brackets

Extensions/Never.html.name: Never
Extensions/Never.html.abstract: An extension to Never to enable an initialisation of a property wrapper without a filter and/or sort strategy to not specifiy the generic types

Enums/SortStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Sort.name: server(_:_:)
Enums/SortStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Sort.abstract: Describes a SortStrategy over a server endpoint by extending an URL route.

Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter.html.name: Sorter
Enums/SortStrategy/Sorter.html.abstract: Describes a Sorter with a direction (ascending, descending), the property as a KeyPath to the later sorted variable of a class and applied if a server strategy is already applied.

Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.name: server(_:_:)
Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.abstract: The server case specifies that the filter process is realized through a server route. The user has the option specify an own transaltion function from the filter properties to the server route.

Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.name: client(_:)
Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.abstract: The client case specifies that the filter process is realized through the REST property wrapper locally by the client.

Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.name: none
Enums/FilterStrategy.html#/s:6ELBRUS14Fi.abstract: The none case specfies that filtering is not wanted and the default case.

Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter.html.name: Filter
Enums/FilterStrategy/Filter.html.abstract: Represents a filter that takes a generic RESTElement and Filterable element to perform the operations: greater equal, less equal and exists, with the possibility to have more than one filter operation

Enums/TokenType.html#/s:6ELBRUS9TokenTyp.name: description
Enums/TokenType.html#/s:6ELBRUS9TokenTyp.abstract: The description variable returns a String representation of the two token types.

Enums/PasswordType.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Pass.name: description
Enums/PasswordType.html#/s:6ELBRUS12Pass.abstract: The description variable is used for the Base64 encoding of the credentials.

Enums/Authorization.html#/s:6ELBRUS13Aut.name: credentials(type:)
Enums/Authorization.html#/s:6ELBRUS13Aut.abstract: describes an authentication over a basic authentication

Enums/PasswordType.html.name: PasswordType
Enums/PasswordType.html.abstract: PasswordType implements the Base64 encoding of the credentials.

Enums/TokenType.html.name: TokenType
Enums/TokenType.html.abstract: TokenType is used for token authentication over a bearer token or a custom defined token.

Enums/FilterStrategy.html.name: FilterStrategy
Enums/FilterStrategy.html.abstract: Represents the filter strategy with the different options client, server and none filter

Enums/SortStrategy.html.name: SortStrategy
Enums/SortStrategy.html.abstract: Represents possible sorting strategies on the server, client or none strategy

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC11stor.name: storagePath
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC11stor.abstract: storagePath specifies the appendix of the storage location in the caching process.

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC_14fil.name: init(_:filterStrategy:sortStrategy:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC_14fil.abstract: init is used for the configuration of the wanted functionality, to specifiy the server endpoint with the network service and optional filtering, sorting and cahcing.

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC12wrap.name: wrappedValue
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTC12wrap.abstract: The wrappedValue is the observed data structure and represents the connected data. This data will be synchronized with the server endpoint.

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.name: init(_:sortStrategy:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.abstract: In the case that no filter is needed, the generic Filterable type will be inferred as Never

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.name: init(_:filterStrategy:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.abstract: In the case that no filter is needed, the generic Sortable type will be inferred as Never

Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.name: init(_:caching:)
Classes/REST.html#/s:6ELBRUS4RESTCAAs5Ne.abstract: In the case that no filter and sorting is needed, the generic Filterable and Sortable type will be both inferred as Never

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: init(encoder:decoder:authorization:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: Initialisation of the URLSessionNetworkHandler with the option to not set the authorization variable and the decision for no authorization.

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: put(_:on:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: Performs a PUT request on the specified URL and replaces the element located on the URL with the element that is passed in

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: get(on:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: Performs a GET request on the specified URL

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: post(_:on:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: Performs a POST request on the specified URL

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.name: delete(at:)
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html#/s.abstract: Performs a DELETE request on the specified URL

Classes/JSONService.html#/s:6ELBRUS11JSO.name: init(url:)
Classes/JSONService.html#/s:6ELBRUS11JSO.abstract: init the Service with an pre-specified URL and the URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler

Classes/Service.html#/s:6ELBRUS7ServiceC.name: init(url:networkHandler:filterServerStrategy:sortServerStrategy:)
Classes/Service.html#/s:6ELBRUS7ServiceC.abstract: With the init of the Service specifies an user the REST endpoint address through an URL. He defines also the NetworkHandler that is used for the network communication. The user has the possibility to set a global filter and/or sort strategy on the server-side with specifying a function for the translation of the strategy to an URLQueryItem.

Classes/Service.html.name: Service
Classes/Service.html.abstract: Represents the service that holds all the network functionality, offers configuration to the filter and sort query creation and stores the endpoints to perform the network requests

Classes/JSONService.html.name: JSONService
Classes/JSONService.html.abstract: JSONService provides an initialisation of a Service with a URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler that uses JSON as encoding and decoding strategy

Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html.name: URLSessionNetworkHandler
Classes/URLSessionNetworkHandler.html.abstract: The URLSessionNetworkHandler confirms to the NetworkHandler protocol and represents an implementation of the different network requests

Classes/URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler.htm.name: URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler
Classes/URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler.htm.abstract: The URLSessionJSONNetworkHandler is a specialized version of URLSessionNetworkHandler that uses JSON as encoding and decoding strategy.

Classes/REST.html.name: REST
Classes/REST.html.abstract: The property wrapper is used for automatic observation of a connected data structure that is automatically synchronized with the specified server endpoint in the Service variable. Filtering, Sorting or Caching the data structure is optional and can be configured with the initialisation.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
